content.rendered:
2022 NHL All-Star Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including three nights hotel stay, entry level tickets for the NHL All-Star Game and Skills Competition, plus more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
HotelRates From
Aria$3,535
Waldorf Astoria$4,075
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit is due at time of booking with balance due three months prior to travel. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
